item.title: My Raspberry Pi Setup
item.description: I have got my first Raspberry Pi 3 several years back and was using it as a cheap desktop for travelling. It was the first SBC board I got. It was lightly used and as I stop travel, it has been put on the side to collect dust for several years. Earlier this year, I salvaged two old HDD hard drives when cleaning up old computer stuff. I bought an ORICO 2 bay hard drive enclosure to fit them.
